home.hero_description: Passionate about creating exceptional user experiences with modern web technologies. Specializing in Angular, React, and TypeScript with 8+ years of industry experience.

about.page_subtitle: Get to know more about my journey, skills, and passion for frontend development
about.story_paragraph_1: With over 8 years of experience in frontend development, I've had the privilege of working with diverse teams and technologies to create exceptional digital experiences. My journey began with a computer science degree and a curiosity for how beautiful interfaces come to life.
about.story_paragraph_2: I specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks, particularly Angular and React, and I'm passionate about creating accessible, performant, and user-centered applications. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and following best practices that ensure scalability and team collaboration.
about.story_paragraph_3: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or mentoring junior developers. I'm always eager to take on new challenges and continue growing in this ever-evolving field.

interests.open_source_desc: Contributing to community projects and sharing knowledge with the development community
interests.mentoring_desc: Helping junior developers grow in their careers and navigate the tech industry
interests.photography_desc: Capturing moments and exploring creative composition through digital and film photography
interests.traveling_desc: Exploring new cultures and gaining fresh perspectives through travel and adventure

values.innovation_desc: I stay curious about new technologies and approaches that can improve user experiences and development efficiency
values.collaboration_desc: Great software is built by great teams. I value open communication, knowledge sharing, and collective problem-solving
values.learning_desc: The tech industry evolves rapidly, and I'm committed to staying current with new tools, frameworks, and best practices
values.quality_desc: I believe in delivering high-quality code that is maintainable, scalable, and follows industry best practices

projects.page_subtitle: A showcase of my work across different technologies and domains

contact.page_subtitle: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's discuss how we can work together!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.a1: Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope. Simple websites may take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 3-6 months. I provide detailed timeline estimates after understanding your requirements.
faq.q2: Do you work with international clients?
faq.a2: Absolutely! I work with clients worldwide and am comfortable with different time zones. I use modern collaboration tools to ensure smooth communication throughout the project.
faq.q3: What technologies do you specialize in?
faq.a3: I specialize in Angular, React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. I also have experience with Node.js, databases, and cloud platforms like AWS and Firebase.
faq.a4: Yes, I offer maintenance and support packages for projects after completion. This includes bug fixes, updates, security patches, and minor feature enhancements.
faq.q5: Can you help with existing projects?
faq.a5: Definitely! I can help improve existing codebases, add new features, optimize performance, or migrate to newer technologies. I start with a thorough code review and assessment.
faq.q6: What is your preferred payment structure?
faq.a6: I typically work with milestone-based payments: 30% upfront, 40% at midpoint, and 30% on completion. For longer projects, we can discuss monthly payment schedules.
